name: 6 Islands
description:
6 islands is an adventure through various islands created entirely by a one-man team over the course of a few weeks.

  • Explore six  beautiful levels.
  • Listen to an immersive and unique soundtrack written by the game's creator.
  • Discover the various characters in the game as you progress, and beware of the various beasts in these lands.

after you download the game click on the options button to check out the controls ,

this will automatically activate the music and sound for an immersive experience.

big shout-out to Mr.Kenny for the assets.
